title: McPixel 3
introscroller: Hi! Thank you for playing McPixel 3! The game is packed with adventure! There are 100 levels full of funny gags, mind-bending puzzles and action minigames! I really hope you like the game! Have tons of fun and an amazing day! Cheers! Sos
hint_tight_text: Press \*bb to cycle|through nearby items|if they're too close.
hint_skip_title: Hopp over det du har sett!
hint_skip_mouse_text: Hold høyreklikk eller mellomrom|for å hoppe over klipp|du allerede har sett!
hint_skip_pad_text: Hold \*bb for å hoppe|over klipp du har sett!
hint_skip_touch_text_new: Swipe sideways|to skip cutscenes|you already seen!
hint_skip_touch_text: Tap the fast forward|button to skip scenes|you already seen!
hint_hint_mouse_text: Press scroll wheel or H|to highlight all|interctive items!
hint_hint_pad_text: Trykk \*xb for å fremheve|alt som kan samhandles med!
hint_hint_touch_text_new: Touch and hold|to highlight all|interactive items!
hint_hint_touch_text: Touch the light|bulb to highlight all|interactive items!
hint_controls_text: Du kan spille med en|mus, en kontroller,|eller en touchskjerm!
hint_controls_mouse: Bruk venstre museknapp for|å samhandle med ting!
hint_controls_controller: Use \*ls to move and|\*ab button to interact!
hint_controls_touch2: Tap with two fingers|to access pause menu!
unlock_quickaccess_text: Use the Quick Menu|to access areas you|already visited!
show_fence_text: Spill flere runder for å|låse opp dette området!
show_bridge_text: Vinn flere runder for|å komme forbi|dette punktet!
unlock_costumes_text: You unlocked new|costumes! Find them|in the shop!
unlock_endless_text: In Endless Mode|you play all the levels|you've already seen!
show_laugh_text2: The laugh track button!|Use this button to|turn on laugh track!
show_laugh_text3: This button will|be here even if you|erase all progress!
show_laugh_text4: So feel free to|play the game again|with laugh track!
show_laugh_text5: You are the best!|Stay awesome!|- Sos Sosowski ♥
show_costumes_text1: You can change how|McPixel looks in the|city level!
show_costumes_text2: Some actions will|require McPixel to|dress back down.
cofirm_quit_text: Er du virkelig, virkerlig|sikker på at du|vil avslutte?
cofirm_erase_text: Vil du slette fremgangen din?|Spillet vil bli tilbakestilt.
benchmark_scroller: Welcome to McPixel Benchmark! Please do not use any controls or move the window while the benchmark is running! The benchmark will take about a minute! Begin when ready! Have fun! Cheers!
help1_text: The goal of the game is to save|McPixel using any means.|Nothing else matters,|only McPixel must survive.
help2_text: Discovering different outcomes|earns you coins. You can use|coins to unlock more rounds.|You get extra coins for finding|all gags in a level.
help3_text: Levels are arranged in rounds.|You play one round until you|beat all the levels. The levels you|already beat are skipped.
help4_text: When you beat a round you can|come back to find more gags|and collect coins. You will|play the round until you find|all gags in all levels.
help5_text: Some levels are locked and will|unlock after you beat previous|level. Some secret levels are|locked until you find a special|solution to unlock them.
help6_text: In Steve levels, you can't win.|You don't need to find all gags |in Steve level to 100% the round|Steve is different than McPixel.|But perhaps he wish he wasn't...
help7_text: McBurg is the hub of McPixel's|adventures. Explore the town|to find rounds and secrets|Some areas might be locked.|Play more to unlock them.
help8_text: Quick Menu lets you access|everything you already found|in McBurg. But first, you|need to explore the city to find |and unlock more stuff.
help9_text: \*ls or \*ds - Move|\*ab or \*lb - OK / Interact|\*bb or \*lt - Back / Next target|\*xb or press \*ls - Hint|\*sb or \*yb - Pause
help9_text2: \*ls or \*ds - Move|\*ab or \*lb - OK / Interact|\*bb or \*lt - Back / Next target|\*xb or press \*ls - Hint|\*yb - Pause
help9_text_simple: \*ls - Move|\*ab - OK / Interact|\*bb - Back / Next target|\*xb - Hint|\*yb - Pause
help10_text: Left click - Interact|Right click / SPACE - Skip|Scroll wheel click - Hint|Escape - Menu
help11_text_new: Tap to interact|Tap with two fingers|to access pause menu|Touch and hold to show hints|Swipe sideways to skip
help11_text: Tap to interact|Tap wrench to access menu|Tap bulb to show hints|Tap fast forward to skip
help11_text_simple: You can use the touch screen|to interact with the game too!
help12_text: F12 to take screenshot.|Hold G to record a GIF.|All screenshots are saved in|Documents/McPixel3
help13_text: If you're lost, slow down a bit.|Ask a friend if you need help.|Sometimes the solution was |right under your nose all along.|Violence is always an answer.
help14_text: If you need help or found any|bugs or want to say hi, join the|McPixel Discord, find @Sosowski|on Twitter or email me directly |at just.sos.it@gmail.com
lvl_vote_sosowski_the_best: SOS SOSOWSKI IS THE BEST HUMAN ---
hint_minigame_text2: Bruk piltaster og mellomrom|for å styre i dem!
show_treasure_text: Running low?|Open the treasure|to get free coins!
unlock_mailbox_text: Check mailbox|to find extra|levels to play!
dlc_new_text: You have mail!|Check mailbox for|new levels!
dlc_granny_letter_text: Hi, McPixel!|This is grandma!|Come and visit me!| - Grandma
dlc_remaster_letter_text: Hi!|Play the remasters|of the first six levels|created for McPixel in 2011.|-Sos
creator_warning_text1: Malicious content may|erase your progress or|damage your computer!
creator_warning_text2: Stay safe!|Only load levels from|trusted sources!
creator_english_text: Level creator and its|documentation is only|available in English!
